nodes.text: An herb grew in the caves of the planet Makeb, and the exoboars native to the planet were actively repelled by the scent of the plant. Sarthon Quis, one of the refugees who were stranded on the planet Makeb when their transport crashed there during the Mandalorian Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Mandalorian warrior culture, discovered the effect the herb had on exoboars, and used it to his advantage to become a famous exoboar hunter.
The Makeb herb was mentioned in the Codex entry for exoboars in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
